treatment.reference: Bergey’s Manal vol 1. pg 286 and Table A2.22. Generic description on page 283.
treatment.description: Coccoid cells, forming loose aggregates. Gram-negative. Motile. The mol% G+C is 40. Unable to grow on methyl sulfides. Able to grow between pH pH 6 and 8. Able to grow between 0.3-1.0 M NaCl. Unable to grow in the absence of NaCl. Able to grow between 30-40˚C. Catabolic substrates are methanol, methylamines, and methanol. No growth on H2/CO2, formate, acetate, or alcohols other than methanol. Tungstate is required. Isolated from lake sediment in Italy. The organism is lysed by SDS.
